title: Lot of SGC T206 Commons / SLs FS

posts.post_title: Lot of SGC T206 Commons / SLs FS
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Bunch of T206 below with prices. Shipping Included. Paypal please... Email for pics and any questions. Would like to bundle multiples, so feel free to make offers for multiple purchases...

Thanks,

Jim
[url]jimalex1973@gmail.com[/url]


RAW:

Jimmy Hart, Montgomery SL    OLD MILL SL   $60  (Raw, a little dirty front and back, rounded corners, no creases...)

Jack White   OLD MILL    $25   (Nice Color, well centered, clean, looks narrow, hence the AUTH, don't think it's trimmed, but who knows? Nice anyway.)
